trans-unit.source: All other properties are inactive when you use a template for the Question view.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 [問題] 檢視的範本時，所有其他屬性都非使用中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the default template for the Question view.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示 [問題] 檢視的預設範本。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the container that a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control used to create an instance of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate" /> template.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控制項用來建立 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate" /> 樣板執行個體的容器。

trans-unit.source: This property provides programmatic access to child controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性提供以程式設計方式存取子控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> that contains a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate" /> template.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />，包含 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate" /> 樣板。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title for the Question view of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控制項之 [問題] 檢視的標題。

trans-unit.source: The title for the Question view.
trans-unit.target: [問題] 檢視的標題。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Identity Confirmation".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 [識別確認]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTitleText%2A> property contains the text to display as the title of the Question view, which asks the user to answer the password confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTitleText%2A>屬性包含要顯示為 [問題] 檢視，其中會要求使用者回答密碼確認問題的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTitleText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A>屬性定義中的文字的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTitleText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> property to define the appearance of the Question view, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTitleText%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>屬性定義的 [問題] 檢視的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTitleText%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTitleText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTitleText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the user does not enter a valid user name, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTitleText%2A> property is reset in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者未輸入有效的使用者名稱，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTitleText%2A>屬性重設<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the rendered output.
trans-unit.target: 接收所呈現之輸出的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl" /> content to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object, for display on the client.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl" /> 內容寫入指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件，以在用戶端顯示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control encloses rendered HTML in a <see langword="table" /> element in order to apply inline styles.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指出控制項是否會將轉譯的 HTML 放置在 <see langword="table" /> 項目內，以便套用內嵌樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control encloses rendered HTML in a <see langword="table" /> element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此控制項將轉譯的 HTML 放在 <see langword="true" /> 中則為 <see langword="table" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: In order to make inline style properties such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓內嵌樣式屬性，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>套用到所有的轉譯控制項的 HTML，ASP.NET 含括在轉譯的 HTML`table`項目。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想外部`table`要呈現的項目會將此屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，如果您嘗試設定內嵌套用至整個控制項的樣式屬性，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Saves any server control state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 儲存頁面回傳至伺服器以來，所發生的任何伺服器控制項狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current state.
trans-unit.target: 傳回伺服器控制項目前的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If there is no state associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有與控制項關聯的狀態，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves any state that was modified after the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState" /> method was invoked.
trans-unit.target: 儲存叫用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState" /> 方法後已修改的任何狀態。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current view state of the control; otherwise, if there is no view state associated with the control, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含控制項目前檢視狀態的物件；如果沒有任何檢視狀態與控制項產生關聯，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the user is sent a password in email.
trans-unit.target: 在藉由電子郵件將密碼傳送至使用者之前發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail> event occurs on the server after the user requests a new or recovered password and submits a correct answer to the password confirmation question (if your membership provider supports password question and answer), but before the password is sent to the user in email.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail>事件發生在伺服器上的使用者要求新的或復原密碼，並送出正確答案給密碼確認問題 （如果您的成員資格提供者支援密碼問題和解答） 之後, 但傳送密碼之前在 電子郵件中的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to do any special processing required before sending the email message, such as setting <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件執行任何特殊處理，必須先傳送電子郵件訊息，例如設定<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>屬性。

trans-unit.source: After the user enters a valid user name and, if relevant, a valid answer, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail> event, and then sends the password information to the user in email.
trans-unit.target: 使用者輸入有效的使用者名稱之後，如果相關，有效的回應，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail>事件，然後將密碼資訊傳送給使用者的電子郵件。

trans-unit.source: The email uses the settings defined in the `<smtpMail>` configuration file element.
trans-unit.target: 電子郵件使用中定義的設定`<smtpMail>`組態檔元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail> event to set properties of the <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> object that contains the email message.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail>事件設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>物件，其中包含電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the SMTP Mail system throws an error while attempting to send an email message.
trans-unit.target: 當 SMTP 郵件系統在嘗試傳送電子郵件訊息時擲回錯誤，則會發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError> event is raised when the SMTP mail server throws an exception when trying to send an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError> SMTP 郵件伺服器在嘗試傳送電子郵件時，會擲回例外狀況時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError> event does not handle the SMTP error from the mail system.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError>事件不會處理的郵件系統的 SMTP 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The method that handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError> event must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object to `true` to handle the error and prevent it from being displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 處理的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError>事件必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>物件`true`來處理錯誤，並防止顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The design-time data for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的設計階段資料。

trans-unit.source: Implements the base <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.System#Web#UI#IControlDesignerAccessor#SetDesignModeState(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作基底 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.System#Web#UI#IControlDesignerAccessor#SetDesignModeState(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to perform when the Submit button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 表示按一下 [送出] 按鈕後要執行的命令。

trans-unit.source: This field is a string that represents the command to perform when the Submit button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是字串，表示要在按下 [提交] 按鈕時執行的命令。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Submit".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 [送出]。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: If you use a template with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, you must use this command name for the action performed to submit the form or the control will not function properly.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項，您必須使用命令的這個名稱送出表單所執行的動作或控制項無法正常運作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image to use as the Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用做 [送出] 按鈕之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image to use as the Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 要用做 [送出] 按鈕之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonImageUrl%2A> property contains the URL of the image to use for the Submit button when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性包含影像的 URL，使用送出按鈕時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A> property is used as the alternative text for the image in browsers that do not display images.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>屬性作為替代文字不會顯示映像的瀏覽器中的映像。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonImageUrl%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonImageUrl%2A> property with declarative syntax.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性與宣告式語法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonImageUrl%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of Submit buttons in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得定義 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控制項中 [送出] 按鈕外觀之屬性集合的參考。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains properties that define the appearance of the Submit buttons.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的參考，包含了定義 [送出] 按鈕外觀的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of Submit buttons in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>屬性會定義在送出按鈕的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `SubmitButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `SubmitButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SubmitButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SubmitButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 中所做的任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>設定：

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the initial or Question view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本來定義初始的外觀或問題檢視的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the effect of setting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A> properties on the different types of Submit buttons in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示設定的效果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>中送出按鈕之不同類型的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the button that submits the form.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定送出表單之按鈕的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text of the button.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Submit".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 [送出]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A> property contains the text displayed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control's Submit button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>屬性包含顯示的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項的 [提交] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: How the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A> property is used depends on the setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>屬性使用的設定而定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A> property determines what kind of button is used to submit entries to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>屬性會決定哪種按鈕用來提交項目，以<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page to display after sending a password successfully.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定成功傳送密碼之後要顯示之頁面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the password success page.
trans-unit.target: 密碼成功頁面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property contains the URL of the page that is displayed after a password has successfully been sent to a user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>屬性包含密碼已成功傳送給使用者之後，會顯示網頁的 URL。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property is not `null`, the user is directed to the page defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property; otherwise, the page containing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>屬性不是`null`，會將使用者導向至網頁中定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>屬性，否則頁面包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制重新整理。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>將使用者重新導向至網頁中定義控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>傳送使用者的新密碼之後的屬性。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於顯示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控制項之 [成功] 檢視的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A> property contains the template that defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control in Success view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>屬性包含範本，以定義的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>順利完成檢視表中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: There are no required or optional fields for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> Success view template.
trans-unit.target: 沒有必要或選用的欄位，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>成功檢視範本。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用來以程式設計方式存取子控制項，當使用範本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display after sending a password successfully.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定成功傳送密碼之後要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text to display when a password has been successfully sent.
trans-unit.target: 成功傳送密碼時要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your password has been sent to you."
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 [我們已將密碼傳送給您]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessText%2A> property is displayed in the Success view when a password has been successfully sent to a user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessText%2A>時密碼已成功傳送給使用者，將會顯示 [成功] 檢視中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A>屬性定義的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you use a template assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessText%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用的範本指派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessText%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property is not `null`, the user is redirected to the page defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control's Success view is not shown to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>屬性不是`null`，使用者重新導向至網頁中定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>屬性，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項的順利完成檢視表不會顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessText%2A>屬性 」 您的密碼已傳送電子郵件地址，我們檔案中。 」

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of style properties that define the appearance of text displayed in the Success view of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得樣式屬性集合的參考，這些樣式屬性定義 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控制項之 [成功] 檢視中顯示的文字外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains properties that define the appearance of text displayed in the Success view.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，包含了定義 [成功] 檢視中顯示之文字外觀的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of text in the Success view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A>屬性會定義文字的外觀，以順利完成檢視表的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `SuccessTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `SuccessTextStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SuccessTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SuccessTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 中所做的任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A>屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A>設定：

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the Success view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A> property has no effect.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of text boxes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>屬性定義中的文字方塊中的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 中所做的任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A> settings:

trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to display the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control in a horizontal or vertical layout.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，其指定以水平配置還是垂直配置顯示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout.TextOnLeft" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout.TextOnLeft" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextLayout%2A> property specifies where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control displays the field labels for the Answer, Question, and User Name text boxes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextLayout%2A>屬性會指定 where<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項會顯示回應、 Question 和使用者名稱的文字方塊中的欄位標籤。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout.TextOnLeft> (the default), the field labels appear to the left of the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextLayout%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout.TextOnLeft>（預設值），欄位標籤會顯示在左邊的文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextLayout%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout.TextOnTop>, the field labels appear above the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextLayout%2A>設<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout.TextOnTop>，欄位標籤出現的文字方塊上方。

trans-unit.source: The text of the labels is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLabelText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionLabelText%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameLabelText%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的標籤文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLabelText%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionLabelText%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameLabelText%2A>屬性，分別。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the field labels are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的欄位標籤樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how changing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextLayout%2A> property affects the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextLayout" /> 屬性未設定為有效的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A>設定：

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Implements the base <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作基底 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the membership provider cannot find the user name entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 當成員資格提供者找不到使用者輸入的使用者名稱時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserLookupError> event is raised when the membership provider cannot find the user name entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserLookupError>成員資格提供者找不到由使用者所輸入的使用者名稱時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserLookupError> event and resets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTitleText%2A> property if the user enters an invalid user name.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserLookupError>事件和重設<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTitleText%2A>屬性，如果使用者輸入使用者名稱無效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that appears in the User Name text box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 [使用者名稱] 文字方塊中出現的文字。

trans-unit.source: The user name entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 使用者輸入的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A> property contains the user name entered by the user, or <xref:System.String.Empty> if the user has not entered a name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>屬性包含由使用者所輸入的使用者名稱或<xref:System.String.Empty>如果使用者未輸入名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A> property is used only in the UserName view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>屬性只適用於使用者檢視表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A> property is saved in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control's control state to preserve the values between round trips to the server even when view state is turned off for the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>屬性儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項的控制項狀態，以保留之間來回伺服器的檢視狀態頁面時，已關閉，即使值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> 控制由文字方塊中，例如屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>，都可以存取頁面生命週期的所有階段。

trans-unit.source: The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged> event triggered by the textboxes.
trans-unit.target: 藉由使用者所做的任何變更會採用控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>文字方塊所觸發的事件。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>屬性定義中的文字的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you assign a template to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A> property to display the UserName view, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A> property is assigned the value entered in a required <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property set to "UserName".
trans-unit.target: 當您指派的範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>屬性來顯示使用者名稱 檢視中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>輸入中需要將值指派給屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>用來控制<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性設定為"UserName"。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>特定成員資格提供者的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed when the user name entered by the user is not a valid user name for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在使用者輸入的使用者名稱不是網站的有效使用者名稱時顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed when the user name entered by the user is not a valid user name for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者輸入的使用者名稱不是網站的有效使用者名稱時顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "We were unable to access your information.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 我們無法存取您的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Please try again."
trans-unit.target: 請重試。」

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A> property contains the error message that is displayed when the user enters a user name that is not recognized by the membership provider defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>屬性包含使用者輸入中定義的成員資格提供者無法辨識的使用者名稱時，會顯示錯誤訊息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>屬性定義中的文字的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you assign a template to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A> property is displayed in an optional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property set to "FailureText".
trans-unit.target: 當您指派的範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>屬性會顯示在選擇性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>用來控制<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性設定為"FailureText"。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the UserName view of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control to instruct the user to enter a user name.

trans-unit.source: The instruction text to display in the UserName view.
trans-unit.target: 要在 [使用者名稱] 檢視中顯示的指示文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Enter your user name to receive your password."
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 [請輸入您的使用者名稱，以接收密碼]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameInstructionText%2A> property is displayed in the UserName view to explain to the user how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameInstructionText%2A>屬性會顯示在使用者檢視表，以向使用者解釋如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.InstructionTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameInstructionText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.InstructionTextStyle%2A>屬性定義中的文字的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameInstructionText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When using a template assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameInstructionText%2A> property is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當使用範本指派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameInstructionText%2A>屬性不會顯示。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameRequiredErrorMessage%2A>屬性包含要在任何中顯示的錯誤訊息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>與相同的頁面上的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example changes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameRequiredErrorMessage%2A> property displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control on the password recovery page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameRequiredErrorMessage%2A>屬性顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>密碼復原頁面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the UserName view of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於顯示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控制項之 [使用者名稱] 檢視的樣板。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the template for displaying the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control in UserName view.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含用於在 [使用者名稱] 檢視中顯示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控制項的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> property contains the template that defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control in UserName view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>屬性包含範本，以定義的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>使用者檢視表中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the required and optional controls used in the UserName view template.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出必要和選擇性使用的控制項中的使用者名稱檢視範本。

trans-unit.source: ID or Command name
trans-unit.target: 識別碼或命令名稱

trans-unit.source: Control type
trans-unit.target: 控制項類型

trans-unit.source: Required/optional
trans-unit.target: 必要/選用

trans-unit.source: Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>.
trans-unit.target: 實作的任何控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>。

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: Any control that causes event bubbling.
trans-unit.target: 造成事件反昇任何控制項。

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: The Submit control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>.
trans-unit.target: 送出控制項可以是任何控制項之事件反昇，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>。

trans-unit.source: The control's `CommandName` property must be set to "Submit".
trans-unit.target: 控制項的`CommandName`屬性必須設定為"Submit"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control throws an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception if the UserName view does not contain the required controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制會擲回<xref:System.Web.HttpException>例外狀況，如果使用者檢視表不包含必要的控制項。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提供的選擇性控制識別碼至錯誤的類型; 的控制項，會擲不回任何例外狀況不過，如果控制項之後忽略由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you use a template to define the appearance of the UserName view, only the following properties affect the behavior of the control:
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本來定義使用者檢視表的外觀時，只有下列屬性會影響控制項的行為：

trans-unit.source: All properties inherited from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> (see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control members table).
trans-unit.target: 所有屬性都繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>(請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制成員資料表)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>。

trans-unit.source: All other properties are inactive when you use a template for the UserName view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他屬性為非使用中，當您使用的使用者檢視表的範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> property to define a template for the UserName view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control that enables the user to choose the domain that contains his or her login information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>屬性可定義使用者檢視表的範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項，可讓使用者選擇他或她的登入資訊所在的網域。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTitleText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A>屬性定義中的文字的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTitleText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTitleText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTitleText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the user does not enter a valid user name, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTitleText%2A> property is reset in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserLookupError> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者未輸入有效的使用者名稱，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTitleText%2A>屬性重設<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserLookupError>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> properties that define the appearance of error messages that are associated with any input validation used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得定義錯誤訊息外觀的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 屬性集合參考，該錯誤訊息與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控制項使用的任何輸入驗證相關聯。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that defines the appearance of error messages that are associated with any input validation used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的參考，定義與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery" /> 控制項使用的任何輸入驗證相關聯之錯誤訊息的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.ValidatorTextStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of validation error messages in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.ValidatorTextStyle%2A>屬性定義的驗證錯誤訊息中出現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.ValidatorTextStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.ValidatorTextStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.ValidatorTextStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 中所做的任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.ValidatorTextStyle%2A>屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user has submitted an answer to the password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 使用者送出密碼復原確認問題的解答時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingAnswer> event occurs on the server after the user submits the answer to the password confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingAnswer>伺服器上使用者送出密碼確認問題的解答之後發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to prepare the answer submitted by the user for the membership provider, for example by converting it to all uppercase or lowercase letters.
trans-unit.target: 若要準備送出的解答使用者的成員資格提供者，例如將其轉換成全為大寫或小寫字母，您可以使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control first raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingAnswer> event, and then uses the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property to compare the answer entered by the user with the password stored in the Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制第一個引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingAnswer>事件，然後使用成員資格提供者中指定與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>要比較的使用者輸入的密碼儲存在網站中的答案。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingAnswer> event and changes the displayed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingAnswer>事件和變更顯示的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the user name is validated by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 在成員資格提供者驗證使用者名稱之前發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingUser> event is raised on the server before the user name is submitted to the membership provider to determine whether the user name is valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingUser>引發伺服器上的使用者名稱提交給成員資格提供者，以判斷是否為有效的使用者名稱之前。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform any preprocessing needed on the user name, such as converting it to all uppercase or lowercase letters, or verifying that the user name is in a particular format, such as an email address.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件執行任何所需的使用者名稱，例如將其轉換成全為大寫或小寫字母，或正在驗證的使用者名稱為特定的格式，例如電子郵件地址的前置處理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control first raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingUser> event, and then uses the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property to determine whether the user name entered is a valid user name for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制第一個引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingUser>事件，然後使用成員資格提供者中指定與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性，以判斷輸入的使用者名稱是否為有效的使用者名稱的網站。

trans-unit.source: If it is valid, and the membership provider supports password question and answer, the password verification question is returned from the Web site and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control displays the Question view.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是有效的而且成員資格提供者支援密碼問題和解答，密碼驗證問題會傳回從網站和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項會顯示 [問題] 檢視。

trans-unit.source: If the user name is not valid, the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A> property is displayed in the UserName view so that the user can enter a different user name.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者名稱不是有效的在文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>屬性會顯示在使用者檢視表中，以便使用者可以輸入不同的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider does not support password question and answer, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail> event is raised and email is sent to the user with the new or recovered password.
trans-unit.target: 如果成員資格提供者不支援密碼問題和解答，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail>就會引發事件及傳送電子郵件給使用者以新的或已復原的密碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingUser> event to check whether the submitted user name is formatted as a valid email address.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingUser>事件，以檢查是否為有效的電子郵件地址格式化送出的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the user name is not formatted properly, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameInstructionText%2A> property is changed to show the error.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者名稱的格式不正確，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameInstructionText%2A>屬性會變更為顯示錯誤。
